price: Kuma lalle ne haƙĩƙa, anã haɗa* ka da Alƙur'ãni daga gun Mai hikima, Masani.
arabic: وَإِنَّكَ لَتُلَقَّى ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ مِن لَّدُنۡ حَكِيمٍ عَلِيمٍ
footnotes: * Lãhira da ĩmãni da ita sunã a cikin ashĩran Allah. Haka karɓar Alƙur'ãni daga Allah yanã a cikin asĩran Allah da Ya bayyana a Littafi. Ganin Mũsa ga wutã da abubuwan da suka auku a wurin game da maganar Allah a gare shi da jũyãwar sanda macijiya da kõmawarta sanda da jũyãwar hannunsa fari ƙal da jũyãwarsa zuwa ga asalinsa, duka sunã a cikin asĩran Allah da Ya bayyana su ga wani mutum.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-innaka latulaqqā al-qur'āna min ladun ḥakīmin ʿalīmin
